New Records: Paul Skenes is the only pitcher in baseball history to have a sub-2.20 ERA and 150-plus strikeouts in his first 21 games.
Pre-Game Insights: Paul Skenes, the No. 1 pick in the 2023 MLB Draft, will start for the Pittsburgh Pirates against the Cincinnati Reds.
Hunter Greene will start for the Cincinnati Reds fresh off the injured list.
The Pirates have a disappointing 72-83 record, while the Reds are at 76-80.
First pitch is at 1:10 p.m. ET.
